price: (9) And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest
arabic: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wanazzalnā mina al-samāi māan mubārakan fa-anbatnā bihi jannātin waḥabba al-ḥaṣīdi
